title: [Site Bug] My post disappeared into the void?
body: I just posted in fan creations (luckily it wasn't really important or lengthy), but when I hit submit, the post disappeared completely. Did I do something wrong?

replies.body:
I just tried to post again in **fan creations** and the same thing happened. So I tested in **champions & skins**, with no problem. **miscellaneous**, no problem. **memes & games**, I got the same issue. 

Further, I haven't seen any new posts in the **fan creations** forum since yesterday (usually somebody's got a silly skin idea at least), and nothing in the **memes and games** forum for 2 days, so obviously everyone's having a similar problem.


It would be great if you could have this fixed soon, because the community is awesome and I've been having a lot of fun creating champ concepts and sharing them. I'd hate to have worked so hard on my latest lore/champ concepts and not be able to post it. :C

Hey there, thanks for reporting this. You did stumble on a bug on our part, I just fixed it and also was able to get your discussions (and any of the others in memes & games and fan creations) back where they should be. Sorry for that!

Do you see your posts in your history?

http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Rubitonabuilding

Hi pendragon, 

All my other posts are there in my history. The one in question I titled 

"[Champion Concept] Coming soon..."

It was just a post to let people know I was working on a cool lore thing involving a bunch of my new champ concepts. The post was not important at all. I'm just worried that it might happen again with a real post.

The weird part is if I make a new post and start typing [Champ... 

The title of my post (as above) shows up in the auto-finish list. Obviously somewhere it knows I made that post. 


Thanks for the help!

P.S. While I've got a red's attention, I know this isn't related to the site at all, but when I'm loading into a game and I minimize it to read/post on the forums (because why waste time staring at a loading screen for 5 minutes), sometimes part of my screen (the left 3/4) stays black and I can't do anything until I've managed to re-open the loading window and minimize it again. IDK what's going on there.

I can answer the P.S.! 

The game client (a.k.a. not the menu AIR client) is still hobbling itself together at that point and is essentially demanding your graphic's attention. This happens to me  quite often (for the exact same reason). It'll play nice if you just wait for all the player 'squares' to load in, they don't have to be 100% or anything, just visibly there. And then when you minimize it'll stay minimized.

IT WORKS. 

{{champion:106}} {{item:3048}} 

^That's a bear hug. Because voliBEAR + seraph's EMBRACE

+3 internets to you, sir.

I actually managed to replicate it in the **Memes & Games** sub-comm, kinda by accident. It doesn't appear in your history and the post is actually wiped, similar look to a URL to an old Gameplay & Strategy post name-switch, simply doesn't exist.

Edit: Just to confirm, Memes and Games does indeed eat even the simplest posts.

How long did you give it? Sometimes (depending on your upload, server load, and other techy what-nots) it can take up to 2 minutes for a post to show up. Other than that, try searching for it in all communities just in case it may have bugged over to another sub-community.
